title: How to Reach Level 99 in Castlevania Dawn of Sorrow

steps.headline: Get a weapon with range, like a spear, or a great sword, or an axe.
steps.description: The final form of the spear, Gungner, is really good for this.

steps.headline: Equip the Mothman soul.
steps.description: The Shaman ring could be equipped also for added experience, but it's not needed.

steps.headline: Go to the Pinnacle and find the spot with a save point, near the area where you fight Dario.
steps.description: Jump into a the room above it. If you are in the right area, in there should be four Bugbears lined up in a row.

steps.headline: Hack and slash away, the experience is usually about 1,000 for every four you kill.
steps.description: With patience, you should level up quickly.

text: Get a weapon with range, like a spear, or a great sword, or an axe. The final form of the spear, Gungner, is really good for this. Equip the Mothman soul. The Shaman ring could be equipped also for added experience, but it's not needed. Go to the Pinnacle and find the spot with a save point, near the area where you fight Dario. Jump into a the room above it. If you are in the right area, in there should be four Bugbears lined up in a row. Hack and slash away, the experience is usually about 1,000 for every four you kill. With patience, you should level up quickly.
